servers.description: Coolify Cloud API. Change the host to your own instance if you are self-hosting.

post.description: Create new application based on a public git repository.

requestBody.description: Application object that needs to be created.

environment_name.description: The environment name. You need to provide at least one of environment_name or environment_uuid.

environment_uuid.description: The environment UUID. You need to provide at least one of environment_name or environment_uuid.

is_static.description: The flag to indicate if the application is static.

base_directory.description: The base directory for all commands.

health_check_start_period.description: Health check start period in seconds.

redirect.description: How to set redirect with Traefik / Caddy. www<->non-www.

instant_deploy.description: The flag to indicate if the application should be deployed instantly.

docker_compose_custom_start_command.description: The Docker Compose custom start command.

docker_compose_custom_build_command.description: The Docker Compose custom build command.

connect_to_docker_network.description: The flag to connect the service to the predefined Docker network.

force_domain_override.description: Force domain usage even if conflicts are detected. Default is false.

autogenerate_domain.description: If true and domains is empty, auto-generate a domain using the server's wildcard domain or sslip.io fallback. Default: true.

message.example: Domain conflicts detected. Use force_domain_override=true to proceed.

warning.example: Using the same domain for multiple resources can cause routing conflicts and unpredictable behavior.

message.example: Domain example.com is already in use by application 'My Application'

name.description: A friendly name for the token.

200.description: Get all backups for a database

application\/json.example: Content is very complex. Will be implemented later.

post.description: Create a new scheduled backup configuration for a database

frequency.description: Backup frequency (cron expression or: every_minute, hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)

save_s3.description: Whether to save backups to S3

s3_storage_uuid.description: S3 storage UUID (required if save_s3 is true)

databases_to_backup.description: Comma separated list of databases to backup

backup_now.description: Whether to trigger backup immediately after creation

database_backup_retention_amount_locally.description: Number of backups to retain locally

database_backup_retention_days_locally.description: Number of days to retain backups locally

database_backup_retention_amount_s3.description: Number of backups to retain in S3

database_backup_retention_days_s3.description: Number of days to retain backups in S3

application\/json.example: Content is very complex. Will be implemented later.

limits_memory_swap.description: Memory swap limit of the database

delete.description: Deletes a backup configuration and all its executions.

parameters.name: scheduled_backup_uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the backup configuration to delete

parameters.name: delete_s3
parameters.description: Whether to delete all backup files from S3

message.example: Backup configuration and all executions deleted.

patch.description: Update a specific backup configuration for a given database, identified by its UUID and the backup ID

save_s3.description: Whether data is saved in s3 or not

backup_now.description: Whether to take a backup now or not

enabled.description: Whether the backup is enabled or not

databases_to_backup.description: Comma separated list of databases to backup

dump_all.description: Whether all databases are dumped or not

database_backup_retention_amount_locally.description: Retention amount of the backup locally

database_backup_retention_days_locally.description: Retention days of the backup locally

database_backup_retention_max_storage_lo.description: Max storage of the backup locally

database_backup_retention_amount_s3.description: Retention amount of the backup in s3

database_backup_retention_days_s3.description: Retention days of the backup in s3

database_backup_retention_max_storage_s3.description: Max storage of the backup in S3

get.description: Start service. `Post` request is also accepted.
Stop service. `Post` request is also accepted.
Restart service. `Post` request is also accepted.

id.description: The application identifier in the database.

static_image.description: Static image used when static site is deployed.

health_check_start_period.description: Health check start period in seconds.

dockerfile.description: Dockerfile content. Used for dockerfile build pack.

docker_compose.description: Docker compose content. Used for docker compose build pack.

swarm_replicas.description: Swarm replicas. Only used for swarm deployments.

swarm_placement_constraints.description: Swarm placement constraints. Only used for swarm deployments.

redirect.description: How to set redirect with Traefik / Caddy. www<->non-www.

created_at.description: The date and time when the application was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the application was last updated.

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the application was deleted.

compose_parsing_version.description: How Coolify parse the compose file.

public_key.description: The public key of the private key.

fingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the private key.

high_disk_usage_notification_sent.description: The flag to indicate if the high disk usage notification has been sent.

unreachable_notification_sent.description: The flag to indicate if the unreachable notification has been sent.

unreachable_count.description: The unreachable count for your server.

log_drain_notification_sent.description: The flag to indicate if the log drain notification has been sent.

delete_unused_volumes.description: The flag to indicate if the unused volumes should be deleted.

delete_unused_networks.description: The flag to indicate if the unused networks should be deleted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the service. Only used for database identification.

uuid.description: The unique identifier of the service.

environment_id.description: The unique identifier of the environment where the service is attached to.

server_id.description: The unique identifier of the server where the service is running.

docker_compose_raw.description: The raw docker-compose.yml file of the service.

docker_compose.description: The docker-compose.yml file that is parsed and modified by Coolify.

destination_id.description: The unique identifier of the destination where the service is running.

connect_to_docker_network.description: The flag to connect the service to the predefined Docker network.

is_container_label_escape_enabled.description: The flag to enable the container label escape.

is_container_label_readonly_enabled.description: The flag to enable the container label readonly.

config_hash.description: The hash of the service configuration.

created_at.description: The date and time when the service was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the service was last updated.

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the service was deleted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

personal_team.description: Whether the team is personal or not.

created_at.description: The date and time the team was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the team was last updated.

show_boarding.description: Whether to show the boarding screen or not.

id.description: The user identifier in the database.

email_verified_at.description: The date when the user email was verified.

created_at.description: The date when the user was created.

updated_at.description: The date when the user was updated.

two_factor_confirmed_at.description: The date when the user two factor was confirmed.

force_password_reset.description: The flag to force the user to reset the password.

marketing_emails.description: The flag to receive marketing emails.

name: The name field is required.
api_url: The api url field is required.
The api url format is invalid.

Retry-After.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying.

message.example: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

bearerAuth.description: Go to `Keys & Tokens` / `API tokens` and create a new token. Use the token as the bearer token.
